short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that adds in a class's concentration to Vanderbilt's class search tool, YES.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vandy ClassFinder aims to help Vanderbilt students easily find what requirements their classes fulfill from within the School of Engineering.  Based off of the user's major, the extension will show which requirements for that major are fulfilled by each class in the user's cart in YES, Vanderbilt's class search engine.
